market_analyst.notes: High-quality local text-generation model available in LM Studio; good for technical analysis summaries.

reasons: small/fast => good for high-throughput news parsing
news_analyst.notes: Smaller instruct-tuned Mistral model suitable for summarization and news extraction.

fundamentals_analyst.notes: Gemma-3 provides robust reasoning when available; fallback to gpt-oss-20b for consistent availability.

reasons: lower latency for many short calls
social_analyst.notes: Efficient for social sentiment and short-context reasoning.

bull_researcher.notes: Large model for deep reasoning and scenario generation.

bear_researcher.notes: Same as bull_researcher for parity in capabilities.

research_manager.notes: Phi-4 is a good alternative when available; gpt-oss-20b chosen for consistency.

reasons: high-capacity model for aggressive scenario analysis
risky_analyst.notes: High-capacity model for aggressive scenario analysis.

reasons: conservative, smaller instruct model to produce restrained outputs
safe_analyst.notes: Conservative, smaller instruct model to produce restrained outputs.

reasons: balanced but smaller model; HF metadata not fetched yet

portfolio_manager.notes: Phi-4 is an alternative; using gpt-oss-20b for parity with other managers.

reasons: 4B family supports low-latency inference; good trade support
trader.notes: Smaller, fast model for trade decision support where latency matters.

default.notes: Fallback default for any agent not explicitly mapped.
